question_1.question: Which authentication method should you use if you want to connect Excel Online with Managed Service Identity (MSI) credentials?
question_1.explanation: MSI Authentication is used when running Excel Online on an Azure VM to leverage Managed Service Identity credentials for connection.

question_2.question: What must be set to 'true' if you want to list shared documents alongside user-owned workbooks in Excel Online?
question_2.explanation: Setting 'Show Shared Documents' to true allows shared documents to be listed with user-owned workbooks.
